actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934.

summary.text: Provides that no license granted for the operation of a broadcasting station under the Communications Act of 1934 shall be for a longer term than five years. Provides for the renewal of such license when the Federal Communications Commission finds that the public interest, convenience, and necessity would be served.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934.
